Text:
Dunno why this has (-6) ... I watched it on a 4x3m projector and thought that the quality was quite good.

V-7.5
A-9

Audio in-sync, subs are off unless you switch them on.

Occasional watermarks/text, and a bunch of blurred squares are all over the screen during play (but I barely even noticed them in most of the scenes.) If those weren't on there, then this would be pretty damn close to a DVDrip.
